sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Disposition of Remains of the Indigent Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Disposition of Remains of the Indigent Act.

sections.text: Donation of unclaimed cadavers in the custody of the State.

sections.text: Institution of medical, mortuary, or other sciences.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department may adopt rules as necessary to implement this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Department may adopt rules as necessary to implement this Act.

sections.heading: Repealer. This Act is repealed on December 31, 2027.
sections.text: Repealer. This Act is repealed on December 31, 2027.
